nodes.text: A clone scout trooper was a member of the 41st Elite Corps and assisted Jedi Master Yoda, alongside clone trooper commander Gree, during the Battle of Kashyyyk. When Order 66 reached Kashyyyk, Gree commanded the trooper to help him execute the Grand Master. Yoda, sensing the deaths of many other Jedi across the galaxy, spun around and swiftly beheaded both the clone scout trooper and Gree, before they could fire a shot.
